name: Scary Clown Girl Criminal
description:
The night has drawn near and the sky is dark, darkness has struck the city of civilians and now begins the legend of a crazy girl who comes each night to reach the civilians and land them in a night of playing tricks and games!!!
The legend of this crazy girl comes under the legend tale of the clown girl who lurks around the streets of the city with her playful clown hammer, chasing around random things and playing with the silent and innocent people of the city. It is said that the crazy girl is technically indulging in a game activity by keeping the night of the people awake with her gang of clowns at the peak of the night to avoid a dull and dark horror!!
As the happening of this game unfolds, turns out that you are in fact the face of the clown gangster crazy girl!!! The whole city is running away from is you, because you look scary, if you want to see what it is that you do which makes you the clown girl, download this game and find out!!!
All the city gangster and civilians of the city are in for a big adventure which will give them a night to remember with the scary clown for ages!! Who would like to see a creepy clown on the loose in the middle of the night running around with a gigantic hammer playing with the peaceful civilians???
When you get in to the city at night and detect civilian passersby’s, you must unleash your sudden scary clown powers, run to the people to show them your clown hammer, the more the people the more the scary clown receives points from the people the more it increases your game play points!!!
Apart from that the scary clown girl holds many more surprises in her crazy clown costume to find all the people of the city and show them. It holds multiple play items and tricks and scary things which your clown gangster will play with the civilian of the city with!!
With the joystick, locate the clown girl crazy girl scary clown target and move the scary clown girl scary clown to insanely run around in the city and find the people to also find her hammer and throw off tricks to find the people, get her hammer and go away. With the help of your clown gang, together find your target to achieve the goal!!
* HOW TO PLAY THE GAME *
• Select the scary clown girl character so she can go in the city.
• Select the mode of the game.
• Proceed to the selection of the game level chronologically.
• Use on screen controls and the joystick to move the scary clown, clown girl around.
• Locate the target to find the people of the city with your clown group then surprise and play with the citizens.
• Once you’ve located your target play with them with your hammer and the other perform some tricks!!
• This will enable to cause more fun and joy to the player playing the game.
• Completion of each level unlocks new levels.


* FEATURES OF THE GAME *
• Multiple scary clown and clown girl characters available to choose from.
• Multiple game play levels of the scary clown game.
• Scary clown 3D simulation.
• Tricks and hammer simulator for scare purposes.
• On screen controls to manage the movements and tricks of the clown group
